pli-tv-pvr5:5.11: tayo kusalahetū, tayo akusalahetū, tayo abyākatahetū.

pli-tv-pvr5:9.3: Sammukhāvinayo, sativinayo, amūḷhavinayo, paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ, yebhuyyasikā, tassapāpiyasikā, tiṇavatthārako—
pli-tv-pvr5:10.1: Siyā ime satta samathā dasa samathā honti, dasa samathā satta samathā honti vatthuvasena pariyāyena?
pli-tv-pvr5:11.2: Vivādādhikaraṇassa dve samathā, anuvādādhikaraṇassa cattāro samathā, āpattādhikaraṇassa tayo samathā, kiccādhikaraṇassa eko samatho.
pli-tv-pvr5:11.3: Evaṃ ime satta samathā dasa samathā honti, dasa samathā satta samathā honti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
pli-tv-pvr5:17.4: yebhuyyasikā, sativinayo, amūḷhavinayo, paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ, tassapāpiyasikā, tiṇavatthārako. #4
pli-tv-pvr5:23.4: yebhuyyasikā, sativinayo, amūḷhavinayo, paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ, tassapāpiyasikā, tiṇavatthārako. #4
pli-tv-pvr5:25.1: Samathā samathassa sādhāraṇā, samathā samathassa asādhāraṇā.
pli-tv-pvr5:25.2: Siyā samathā samathassa sādhāraṇā, siyā samathā samathassa asādhāraṇā.
pli-tv-pvr5:26.3: Yebhuyyasikā sammukhāvinayassa sādhāraṇā, sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa asādhāraṇā. #1
pli-tv-pvr5:27.1: Sativinayo sammukhāvinayassa sādhāraṇo, amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya asādhāraṇo. #2
pli-tv-pvr5:28.1: Amūḷhavinayo sammukhāvinayassa sādhāraṇo, paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa asādhāraṇo. #3
pli-tv-pvr5:29.1: Paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayassa sādhāraṇaṃ, tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa asādhāraṇaṃ. #4
pli-tv-pvr5:30.1: Tassapāpiyasikā sammukhāvinayassa sādhāraṇā, tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa asādhāraṇā. #5
pli-tv-pvr5:31.1: Tiṇavatthārako sammukhāvinayassa sādhāraṇo, yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya asādhāraṇo. #6
pli-tv-pvr5:34.1: Samathā samathassa tabbhāgiyā, samathā samathassa aññabhāgiyā.
pli-tv-pvr5:34.2: Siyā samathā samathassa tabbhāgiyā, siyā samathā samathassa aññabhāgiyā.
pli-tv-pvr5:35.3: Yebhuyyasikā sammukhāvinayassa tabbhāgiyā, sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa aññabhāgiyā. #1
pli-tv-pvr5:36.1: Sativinayo sammukhāvinayassa tabbhāgiyo, amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya aññabhāgiyo. #2
pli-tv-pvr5:37.1: Amūḷhavinayo sammukhāvinayassa tabbhāgiyo, paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa aññabhāgiyo. #3
pli-tv-pvr5:38.1: Paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayassa tabbhāgiyaṃ, tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa aññabhāgiyaṃ. #4
pli-tv-pvr5:39.1: Tassapāpiyasikā sammukhāvinayassa tabbhāgiyā, tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa aññabhāgiyā. #5
pli-tv-pvr5:40.1: Tiṇavatthārako sammukhāvinayassa tabbhāgiyo, yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya aññabhāgiyo. #6
pli-tv-pvr5:41.1: Evaṃ siyā samathā samathassa tabbhāgiyā, evaṃ siyā samathā samathassa aññabhāgiyā.
pli-tv-pvr5:44.1: Yebhuyyasikā sativinayo amūḷhavinayo paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ tassapāpiyasikā tiṇavatthārako—
pli-tv-pvr5:45.1: Sativinayo amūḷhavinayo paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ tassapāpiyasikā tiṇavatthārako sammukhāvinayo—
pli-tv-pvr5:46.1: Amūḷhavinayo paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ tassapāpiyasikā tiṇavatthārako sammukhāvinayo yebhuyyasikā—
pli-tv-pvr5:47.1: Paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ tassapāpiyasikā tiṇavatthārako sammukhāvinayo yebhuyyasikā sativinayo—
pli-tv-pvr5:48.1: Tassapāpiyasikā tiṇavatthārako sammukhāvinayo yebhuyyasikā sativinayo amūḷhavinayo—
pli-tv-pvr5:49.1: Tiṇavatthārako sammukhāvinayo yebhuyyasikā sativinayo amūḷhavinayo paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr5:50.1: Sammukhāvinayo yebhuyyasikā sativinayo amūḷhavinayo paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ tassapāpiyasikā—
pli-tv-pvr5:53.1: Vinayo siyā sammukhāvinayo siyā na sammukhāvinayo.
pli-tv-pvr5:54.1: Vinayo siyā yebhuyyasikā, siyā na yebhuyyasikā.
pli-tv-pvr5:55.1: Vinayo siyā sativinayo, siyā na sativinayo.
pli-tv-pvr5:56.1: Vinayo siyā amūḷhavinayo, siyā na amūḷhavinayo.
pli-tv-pvr5:57.1: Vinayo siyā paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ, siyā na paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:58.1: Vinayo siyā tassapāpiyasikā, siyā na tassapāpiyasikā.
pli-tv-pvr5:59.1: Vinayo siyā tiṇavatthārako, siyā na tiṇavatthārako.
pli-tv-pvr5:63.1: Yebhuyyasikā siyā kusalā, siyā akusalā, siyā abyākatā. #2
pli-tv-pvr5:64.1: Sativinayo siyā kusalo, siyā akusalo, siyā abyākato. #3
pli-tv-pvr5:65.1: Amūḷhavinayo siyā kusalo, siyā akusalo, siyā abyākato. #4
pli-tv-pvr5:66.1: Paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ siyā kusalaṃ, siyā akusalaṃ, siyā abyākataṃ. #5
pli-tv-pvr5:67.1: Tassapāpiyasikā siyā kusalā, siyā akusalā siyā abyākatā. #6
pli-tv-pvr5:68.1: Tiṇavatthārako siyā kusalo, siyā akusalo, siyā abyākato. #7
pli-tv-pvr5:70.1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ siyā kusalaṃ, siyā akusalaṃ, siyā abyākataṃ. #1
pli-tv-pvr5:71.1: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ siyā kusalaṃ, siyā akusalaṃ, siyā abyākataṃ. #2
pli-tv-pvr5:73.1: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ siyā kusalaṃ, siyā akusalaṃ, siyā abyākataṃ. #4
pli-tv-pvr5:75.1: Yattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati;
pli-tv-pvr5:75.2: yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:75.3: Na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati. #1
pli-tv-pvr5:76.1: Yattha sativinayo labbhati, tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati;
pli-tv-pvr5:76.2: yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, tattha sativinayo labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:76.3: Na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati. #2
pli-tv-pvr5:77.1: Yattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati;
pli-tv-pvr5:77.2: yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:77.3: Na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati. #3
pli-tv-pvr5:78.1: Yattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati, tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati;
pli-tv-pvr5:78.2: yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:78.3: Na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati. #4
pli-tv-pvr5:79.1: Yattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati;
pli-tv-pvr5:79.2: yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:79.3: Na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati. #5
pli-tv-pvr5:80.1: Yattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati;
pli-tv-pvr5:80.2: yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:80.3: Na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati. #6
pli-tv-pvr5:81.3: Na tattha sativinayo, na tattha amūḷhavinayo, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā, na tattha tiṇavatthārako. #7
pli-tv-pvr5:82.3: Na tattha amūḷhavinayo, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā, na tattha tiṇavatthārako, na tattha yebhuyyasikā.
pli-tv-pvr5:83.3: Na tattha yebhuyyasikā, na tattha sativinayo, na tattha amūḷhavinayo, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā. #9
pli-tv-pvr5:85.1: Yasmiṃ samaye sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati, yattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:85.2: Na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati. #1
pli-tv-pvr5:86.1: Yasmiṃ samaye sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati, yattha sativinayo labbhati tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati tattha sativinayo labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:86.2: Na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati. #2
pli-tv-pvr5:87.1: Yasmiṃ samaye sammukhāvinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati, yattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:87.2: Na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati. #3
pli-tv-pvr5:88.1: Yasmiṃ samaye sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati, yattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:88.2: Na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati. #4
pli-tv-pvr5:89.1: Yasmiṃ samaye sammukhāvinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati, yattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:89.2: Na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati. #5
pli-tv-pvr5:90.1: Yasmiṃ samaye sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati, yattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:90.2: Na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati. #6
pli-tv-pvr5:92.1: Adhikaraṇanti vā samathāti vā ime dhammā saṃsaṭṭhā udāhu visaṃsaṭṭhā?
pli-tv-pvr5:92.2: Labbhā ca panimesaṃ dhammānaṃ vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvā nānākaraṇaṃ paññāpetunti?
pli-tv-pvr5:93.1: Adhikaraṇanti vā samathāti vā ime dhammā visaṃsaṭṭhā, no saṃsaṭṭhā.
pli-tv-pvr5:93.2: Labbhā ca panimesaṃ dhammānaṃ vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvā nānākaraṇaṃ paññāpetunti.
pli-tv-pvr5:93.5: Adhikaraṇanti vā samathāti vā ime dhammā saṃsaṭṭhā, no visaṃsaṭṭhā.
pli-tv-pvr5:93.6: No ca labbhā imesaṃ dhammānaṃ vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvā nānākaraṇaṃ paññāpetuṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:93.10: Adhikaraṇā samathehi sammanti, samathā adhikaraṇehi sammanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:93.11: Evaṃ, ime dhammā saṃsaṭṭhā no visaṃsaṭṭhā;
pli-tv-pvr5:93.12: no ca labbhā imesaṃ dhammānaṃ vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvā nānākaraṇaṃ paññāpetun”ti.

pli-tv-pvr5:106.1: Vivādādhikaraṇañca anuvādādhikaraṇañca āpattādhikaraṇañca katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:106.2: Vivādādhikaraṇañca anuvādādhikaraṇañca āpattādhikaraṇañca sattahi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr5:106.3: sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca. #7
pli-tv-pvr5:107.1: Vivādādhikaraṇañca anuvādādhikaraṇañca kiccādhikaraṇañca katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:107.2: Vivādādhikaraṇañca anuvādādhikaraṇañca kiccādhikaraṇañca pañcahi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr5:107.3: sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca. #8
pli-tv-pvr5:108.1: Anuvādādhikaraṇañca āpattādhikaraṇañca kiccādhikaraṇañca katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:108.2: Anuvādādhikaraṇañca āpattādhikaraṇañca kiccādhikaraṇañca chahi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr5:108.3: sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca. #9
pli-tv-pvr5:109.1: Vivādādhikaraṇañca anuvādādhikaraṇañca āpattādhikaraṇañca kiccādhikaraṇañca katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:109.2: Vivādādhikaraṇañca anuvādādhikaraṇañca āpattādhikaraṇañca kiccādhikaraṇañca sattahi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr5:109.3: sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca. #10
pli-tv-pvr5:111.1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ katihi samathehi sammati, katihi samathehi na sammati?
pli-tv-pvr5:111.2: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ katihi samathehi sammati, katihi samathehi na sammati?
pli-tv-pvr5:111.3: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ katihi samathehi sammati, katihi samathehi na sammati?
pli-tv-pvr5:111.4: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ katihi samathehi sammati, katihi samathehi na sammati?
pli-tv-pvr5:112.4: sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca. #1
pli-tv-pvr5:113.2: sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:113.4: yebhuyyasikāya ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca. #2
pli-tv-pvr5:114.2: sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:114.4: yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca. #3
pli-tv-pvr5:115.4: yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca. #4
pli-tv-pvr5:116.4: sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:117.4: sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:117.6: sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca. #6
pli-tv-pvr5:118.6: sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca. #7
pli-tv-pvr5:119.4: sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:120.4: sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:120.6: yebhuyyasikāya ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca. #9
pli-tv-pvr5:121.4: sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:121.6: yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca. #10
pli-tv-pvr5:122.1: Vivādādhikaraṇañca anuvādādhikaraṇañca āpattādhikaraṇañca katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:122.3: Vivādādhikaraṇañca anuvādādhikaraṇañca āpattādhikaraṇañca sattahi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr5:122.4: sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca. #11
pli-tv-pvr5:123.1: Vivādādhikaraṇañca anuvādādhikaraṇañca kiccādhikaraṇañca katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:123.3: Vivādādhikaraṇañca anuvādādhikaraṇañca kiccādhikaraṇañca pañcahi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr5:123.4: sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:124.1: Anuvādādhikaraṇañca āpattādhikaraṇañca kiccādhikaraṇañca katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:124.3: Anuvādādhikaraṇañca āpattādhikaraṇañca kiccādhikaraṇañca chahi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr5:124.4: sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:125.1: Vivādādhikaraṇañca anuvādādhikaraṇañca āpattādhikaraṇañca kiccādhikaraṇañca katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:125.3: Vivādādhikaraṇañca anuvādādhikaraṇañca āpattādhikaraṇañca kiccādhikaraṇañca sattahi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr5:125.4: sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca. #14
pli-tv-pvr5:128.1: Siyā samathā samathehi sammanti, siyā samathā samathehi na sammanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:128.2: Siyā samathā adhikaraṇehi sammanti, siyā samathā adhikaraṇehi na sammanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:128.3: Siyā adhikaraṇā samathehi sammanti, siyā adhikaraṇā samathehi na sammanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:128.4: Siyā adhikaraṇā adhikaraṇehi sammanti, siyā adhikaraṇā adhikaraṇehi na sammanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:129.1: Kathaṃ siyā samathā samathehi sammanti, kathaṃ siyā samathā samathehi na sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:129.3: sativinayena na sammati, amūḷhavinayena na sammati, paṭiññātakaraṇena na sammati, tassapāpiyasikāya na sammati, tiṇavatthārakena na sammati. #1
pli-tv-pvr5:130.2: amūḷhavinayena na sammati, paṭiññātakaraṇena na sammāti, tassapāpiyasikāya na sammati, tiṇavatthārakena na sammati, yebhuyyasikāya na sammati. #2
pli-tv-pvr5:131.2: paṭiññātakaraṇena na sammati, tassapāpiyasikāya na sammati, tiṇavatthārakena na sammati, yebhuyyasikāya na sammati, sativinayena na sammati. #3
pli-tv-pvr5:132.2: tassapāpiyasikāya na sammati, tiṇavatthārakena na sammati, yebhuyyasikāya na sammati, sativinayena na sammati, amūḷhavinayena na sammati. #4
pli-tv-pvr5:133.2: tiṇavatthārakena na sammati, yebhuyyasikāya na sammati, sativinayena na sammati, amūḷhavinayena na sammati, paṭiññātakaraṇena na sammati. #5
pli-tv-pvr5:134.2: yebhuyyasikāya na sammati, sativinayena na sammati, amūḷhavinayena na sammati, paṭiññātakaraṇena na sammati, tassapāpiyasikāya na sammati.
pli-tv-pvr5:134.4: Evaṃ siyā samathā samathehi na sammanti. #6
pli-tv-pvr5:135.1: Kathaṃ siyā samathā adhikaraṇehi sammanti, kathaṃ siyā samathā adhikaraṇehi na sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:135.2: Sammukhāvinayo vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:136.1: Yebhuyyasikā vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:137.1: Sativinayo vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:138.1: Amūḷhavinayo vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:139.1: Paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:140.1: Tassapāpiyasikā vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:141.1: Tiṇavatthārako vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:141.4: Evaṃ siyā samathā adhikaraṇehi na sammanti. #7
pli-tv-pvr5:142.1: Kathaṃ siyā adhikaraṇā samathehi sammanti, kathaṃ siyā adhikaraṇā samathehi na sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:142.2: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:142.3: sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca na sammati. #1
pli-tv-pvr5:143.1: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:143.2: yebhuyyasikāya ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca na sammati. #2
pli-tv-pvr5:144.1: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:144.2: yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca na sammati. #3
pli-tv-pvr5:145.2: yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca na sammati.
pli-tv-pvr5:145.4: Evaṃ siyā adhikaraṇā samathehi na sammanti. #4
pli-tv-pvr5:146.2: Kathaṃ siyā adhikaraṇā adhikaraṇehi na sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:146.3: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:147.1: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:148.1: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:149.1: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:149.4: Evaṃ siyā adhikaraṇā adhikaraṇehi na sammanti. #4
pli-tv-pvr5:150.1: Chāpi samathā cattāropi adhikaraṇā sammukhāvinayena sammanti;
pli-tv-pvr5:152.1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti?
pli-tv-pvr5:152.2: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ na katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti;
pli-tv-pvr5:152.3: api ca vivādādhikaraṇapaccayā cattāro adhikaraṇā jāyanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:152.6: “dhammo”ti vā, “adhammo”ti vā, “vinayo”ti vā, “avinayo”ti vā, “abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatenā”ti vā, “bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatenā”ti vā, “anāciṇṇaṃ tathāgatenā”ti vā, “āciṇṇaṃ tathāgatenā”ti vā, “apaññattaṃ tathāgatenā”ti vā, “paññattaṃ tathāgatenā”ti vā, “āpattī”ti vā, “anāpattī”ti vā, “lahukā āpattī”ti vā, “garukā āpattī”ti vā, “sāvasesā āpattī”ti vā, “anavasesā āpattī”ti vā, “duṭṭhullā āpattī”ti vā “aduṭṭhullā āpattī”ti vā.
pli-tv-pvr5:152.7: Yaṃ tattha bhaṇḍanaṃ kalaho viggaho vivādo nānāvādo aññathāvādo vipaccatāya vohāro medhakaṃ, idaṃ vuccati vivādādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:152.11: Tāya āpattiyā saṃgho kammaṃ karoti kiccādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:153.1: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti?
pli-tv-pvr5:153.2: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ na katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti;
pli-tv-pvr5:153.3: api ca anuvādādhikaraṇapaccayā cattāro adhikaraṇā jāyanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:153.5: Idha bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ anuvadanti sīlavipattiyā vā ācāravipattiyā vā diṭṭhivipattiyā vā ājīvavipattiyā vā.
pli-tv-pvr5:153.6: Yo tattha anuvādo anuvadanā anullapanā anubhaṇanā anusampavaṅkatā abbhussahanatā anubalappadānaṃ, idaṃ vuccati anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:153.10: Tāya āpattiyā saṃgho kammaṃ karoti kiccādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:154.1: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti?
pli-tv-pvr5:154.2: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ na katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti;
pli-tv-pvr5:154.3: api ca āpattādhikaraṇapaccayā cattāro adhikaraṇā jāyanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:154.5: Pañcapi āpattikkhandhā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ, sattapi āpattikkhandhā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ, idaṃ vuccati āpattādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:154.9: Tāya āpattiyā saṃgho kammaṃ karoti kiccādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:155.1: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti?
pli-tv-pvr5:155.2: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ na katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, api ca kiccādhikaraṇapaccayā cattāro adhikaraṇā jāyanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:155.4: Yā saṃghassa kiccayatā karaṇīyatā apalokanakammaṃ ñattikammaṃ ñattidutiyakammaṃ ñatticatutthakammaṃ, idaṃ vuccati kiccādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:155.8: Tāya āpattiyā saṃgho kammaṃ karoti kiccādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:157.1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ bhajati?
pli-tv-pvr5:158.1: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ bhajati?
pli-tv-pvr5:159.1: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ bhajati?
pli-tv-pvr5:160.1: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ bhajati?
pli-tv-pvr5:161.1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ bhajati, vivādādhikaraṇaṃ upanissitaṃ, vivādādhikaraṇaṃ pariyāpannaṃ, vivādādhikaraṇena saṅgahitaṃ. #1
pli-tv-pvr5:162.1: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ bhajati, anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ upanissitaṃ, anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ pariyāpannaṃ, anuvādādhikaraṇena saṅgahitaṃ. #2
pli-tv-pvr5:163.1: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ bhajati, āpattādhikaraṇaṃ upanissitaṃ, āpattādhikaraṇaṃ pariyāpannaṃ, āpattādhikaraṇena saṅgahitaṃ. #3
pli-tv-pvr5:164.1: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ kiccādhikaraṇaṃ bhajati, kiccādhikaraṇaṃ upanissitaṃ, kiccādhikaraṇaṃ pariyāpannaṃ, kiccādhikaraṇena saṅgahitaṃ. #4
pli-tv-pvr5:165.1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ sattannaṃ samathānaṃ kati samathe bhajati, kati samathe upanissitaṃ, kati samathe pariyāpannaṃ, katihi samathehi saṅgahitaṃ, katihi samathehi sammati? #1
pli-tv-pvr5:166.1: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ sattannaṃ samathānaṃ kati samathe bhajati, kati samathe upanissitaṃ, kati samathe pariyāpannaṃ, katihi samathehi saṅgahitaṃ, katihi samathehi sammati? #2
pli-tv-pvr5:167.1: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sattannaṃ samathānaṃ kati samathe bhajati, kati samathe upanissitaṃ, kati samathe pariyāpannaṃ, katihi samathehi saṅgahitaṃ, katihi samathehi sammati? #3
pli-tv-pvr5:168.1: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ sattannaṃ samathānaṃ kati samathe bhajati, kati samathe upanissitaṃ, kati samathe pariyāpannaṃ, katihi samathehi saṅgahitaṃ, katihi samathehi sammati? #4
pli-tv-pvr5:169.1: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ sattannaṃ samathānaṃ dve samathe bhajati, dve samathe upanissitaṃ, dve samathe pariyāpannaṃ, dvīhi samathehi saṅgahitaṃ, dvīhi samathehi sammati—
pli-tv-pvr5:170.1: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ sattannaṃ samathānaṃ cattāro samathe bhajati, cattāro samathe upanissitaṃ, cattāro samathe pariyāpannaṃ, catūhi samathehi saṅgahitaṃ, catūhi samathehi sammati—
pli-tv-pvr5:170.2: sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca. #2
pli-tv-pvr5:171.1: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sattannaṃ samathānaṃ tayo samathe bhajati, tayo samathe upanissitaṃ, tayo samathe pariyāpannaṃ, tīhi samathehi saṅgahitaṃ tīhi samathehi sammati—
pli-tv-pvr5:171.2: sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca. #3
pli-tv-pvr5:172.1: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ sattannaṃ samathānaṃ ekaṃ samathaṃ bhajati, ekaṃ samathaṃ upanissitaṃ, ekaṃ samathaṃ pariyāpannaṃ, ekena samathena saṅgahitaṃ, ekena samathena sammati—
